General.Name: Lotus Resources Limited
General.Description: Lotus Resources Limited explores for, develops, and evaluates mineral properties in Australia and Africa. The company holds an 85% interest in the Kayelekera uranium project located in Malawi, Africa; and the Livingstonia project located in northern Malawi, southern Africa. The company was formerly known as Hylea Metals Limited and changed its name to Lotus Resources Limited in August 2019. Lotus Resources Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 140 St Georges Terrace, Perth, WA, Australia, 6000
